body.p: Dr Sir Martin Hoover is now confined in our Jail to pay a fine of $50oo also to satisfy a judgement for 30 days imprisonment He is without means has a wife and three children his friends represent to me that his wife is sick I have no doubt you would do a meritorious act by granting him a pardon
